page.title: 20ACKNOWLEDGMENTS
page.content: Meldrum and Carmondean Primaries acknowledge help from these pupils:- C.Boyle,K.Dawson,L.Forsyth,K.Glen, S.Gowans,S.Hannah,J.McCullough,D.Moore Y.Logie,L.Nicol,J.Reid,S.Smith, P.Strathie,P.Wallas,D.Ritchie,J.McLean K.Boyle,A.Duncan,D.Mitchell,D.Parker, E.Petrie,T.Rice,P.Schooler,B.Thompson, K.Somerville,B.Turner,R.Whieldon, D.Wilson,J.Noon,M.McIntosh,L.Sneddon, I.Brown,A.Bull,W.Denholm,S.Gallacher,G .Gibb,B.Holt,K.Hunter,D.Johnson,D.Macd onald,I.Mcmillan,C.Mcphee,N.Trotter,T. Young,R.Pearson,M.Currie,N.Brooks,E.Ca meron,L.Destry,D.Horan,T.Hughson,K.Hun ter,L.Imrie,S.Jawas,L.Law,E.Mcmillan,C .Mclean,L.Mcneill,G.Mcpherson,N.Mcseve ny,M.Sinclair,L.Thorburn,W.Stoa,S.Amie s.
